title: ACA.Color.Picker.v2.00.CRACKED-ONY
description:
APPLICATION : ACA Color Picker v2.00 *CRACKED*
	 OS : Win
       TYPE : Util
        WWW : http://www.acasystems.com/en/color-picker/
    RELDATE : 23/03/2008
 PROTECTION : Serial
 CRKRELDATE : 07/04/2008

INSTALLATION: Install.
              Copy .exe from crack dir. and overwrite installed one.

       NOTES: 
              you got to love acasystems humour... snippet from aca006u.dll

              PUSH EDI
              MOV ECX,9
              MOV ESI,aca006u_1002F214               ; UNICODE "Don&#039;t crack me! :("
              LEA EDI,DWORD PTR SS:[ESP+018h]
              REP MOVS DWORD PTR ES:[EDI],DWORD PTR DS:[ESI]
              XOR EAX,EAX
              MOVS WORD PTR ES:[EDI],WORD PTR DS:[ESI]
              PUSH aca006u_1002F1D4                  ; UNICODE "Oh, baby, don&#039;t crack me... :)"
              LEA ECX,DWORD PTR SS:[ESP+01Ch]
              PUSH 020h
              PUSH ECX

              by taking a shortcut around this boring dll you pretty much solve the whole protection.
              you just need to fix some eyecandy after that, can be done in many ways, nice.
              you can simply make a flag true and it will load registration infos from config.ini
              located in "application data". i felt it&#039;s pretty boring editing a file after replacing
              the exe so i just skipped that flag and rewrote the unlicensed message.
       
              more sparetime killed.. enjoy! / ONY

       ABOUT:

ACA Color Picker is a color picker software, it pick the color value of any screen pixel and displays
its value in a value of formats such as CMY/CMYK, Decimal, Hexadecimal, HSB/HSV, HSL, HSL(Windows),
HTML and RGB, VC++, VB, Delphi and ActionScript. You can also export the picked colors to .ACO file
(Adobe Color File), it can be loaded on Adobe Photoshop. With ACA Color Picker, you can get kinds of
color code, just after click several times, it&#039;s very helpful for web designer, webmaster or programmer.

Main Features of ACA Color Picker

* Realtime screen preview.

* Alternative access to the windows color dialog.

* Format converts from CMY/CMYK, Decimal, Hexadecimal, HSB/HSV, HSL, HSL(Windows), HTML and RGB, VC++,
  VB, Delphi and ActionScript.
  
* Output formats options: Standard, Bytes, Percentage and Decimal.

* Color picker finds the color of any pixel on the screen.

* Export to the clipboard, auto copy to clipboard.

* Export your color palate as .aco file format(Adobe Color File Format)

* Save the color lists to text file and open the color lists from saved file.

* Displays the portion of the screen that mouse is over at to 36x zoom, and can get a 1x1, 2x2, 4x4, 8x8,
  12x12, 24x24 average.
  
* Support for naming the colors

* User-define hotkey.

* Support for advanced mode.

* Support for minimize the window to system tray icon.
